messages.subject: Re: Single Moms?
messages.msgSnippet: Yep.  Single mom here, for our entire unschooling career of five years.  It s been awesome!  I m getting remarried in July though, which almost makes me feel
messages.messageBody:
Yep. Single mom here, for our entire unschooling career of five
years. It's been awesome! I'm getting remarried in July though,
which almost makes me feel like a sellout.

:-)



> Are any of you single Moms? Or were you raised unschooling by a
single Mom?

messages.subject: Re: Single Moms?
messages.msgSnippet: ... I am. I ve been single my son s whole life. I can t really imagine being married at this point. I really like being able to make whatever decisions i want
messages.messageBody:
> Are any of you single Moms? Or were you raised unschooling by a
>single Mom? I am looking at a slight possibility of being one. :(

I am. I've been single my son's whole life. I can't really imagine
being married at this point. I really like being able to make whatever
decisions i want as far as our family is concerned, and not have to
compromise.

The list that was just started, Crazylifeunschoolers, has a fair
amount of single parents i think...i've been a little busy to keep up
with all the msgs.


Katherine

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Single Moms?
messages.msgSnippet: I am right now and I have never been happier.  New to homeschooling.  It is wonderful.  I won t be single for long.  But I will forever be unschooling. Carole
messages.messageBody:
I am right now and I have never been happier. New to homeschooling. It is wonderful. I won't be single for long. But I will forever be unschooling.

Carole


----- Original Message ----
From: Wildflower Car <unschoolfool@...>
To: AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, March 19, 2007 11:30:28 PM
Subject: [AlwaysLearning] Single Moms?


Are any of you single Moms? Or were you raised unschooling by a single Mom?
I am looking at a slight possibility of being one. :(

Love and Happiness,
Wildflower
